===Usage notes===
* Unlike Mandarin or Cantonese, in Min Nan {{lang|zh|車站／车站}} refers to a ''bus station'' only. See {{zh-l|車頭}} ([[chhia-thâu]]) for the Min Nan word for ''train station''.
